After reading Ch 1 I now get why people are upset with this doujin and all I can say is that yes It's a gyaru doujin so expect the girl to be a gyaru but it doesn't mean that this is an NTR, it's still a vanilla doujin. Narushiro genuinely loves Sakaguchi and Ch 2 shows that. Because to Narushiro, Sakaguchi was the only one that genuinely, with all his heart love her. So I'm sure that Narushiro is in love with Sakaguchi, she doesn't want to just have sex with Sakaguchi anymore, she wants to spend time with him and enjoy things with him together. Ch 2 and the end of Ch 1 shows this. And why would a gyaru date someone like him (no offense) If she doesn't love him. It just doesn't make sense. Plus, she actually said that she was serious about him and would do anything that he wants. And let's not forget the fact that she actually wore a bra just for him. If that's not love then what is it? She's a gyaru but our MC showed her how to love. That's the premise of the doujin. Overall, 10/10

Man this comment section is full of insecure fuckers and really can't read well enough but to be so shallow and jump to conclusions about FMC cheating while having delusions about how down the road would happen. Those are signs of insecurities that would put you in a vicious cycle of negativity. Look at them, just taking quotes out of context like FMC: "If you stop right now, I might cheat on you" So if you take that out of context and BELIEVE that to be true, well of course, you feel insecure and think she's gonna cheat (dude what fucking cheater would actually declare to their partner I'M GOING TO FUCKING CHEAT, yea?); now look at what she said later: FMC: "I was just teasing you." These guys have no brain cells I swear, man.
